about_the_game:
Extra content for [WONDER BOY : Asha in Monster World]!

Includes two artbooks that were released exclusively in the Japanese region! Plus, arranged BGM, MIDI data and liner notes for this DLC!

▼Contents ▼
-Digital art book 'WONDER BOY Asha in Monster World Art Book' (80-page PDF)
-Digital character book "MONSTER WORLD 4 CHARACTER BOOK" (38 pages PDF)
-SOUND BOX" - a collection of sound contents.
　-Arranged medley/piano version (MP3, 7 min 40 sec)
　-Arranged medley/PSG-style version (MP3, 7 min 40 sec)
　-Arranged medley/MIDI data (MDI)
　-Shinichi Sakamoto, liner notes (TXT, Japanese only)

*All artbooks/character books are in Japanese.
*The content of the artbook/character book is identical to that included in the console version [WONDER BOY Asha in Monster World Special Pack] for sale in the Japanese region.
